question: According to Central Statistics Office which two states are the fastest expanding State economies in 2015-16?
explanation: According to Central Statistics Office(CSO) Jammu and Kashmir and Arunachal Pradesh were the fastest expanding State economies in 2015-16. Comparison between states plays a healthy role in promoting competitive federalismthereby promoting fair competition. On the whole, the national economy expanded by 8 per cent in 2015-16.
